Package Extbase\Property

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Property_Exception An generic Property related exception
Tx_Extbase_Property_Mapper The Property Mapper maps properties from a source onto a given target object, often a (domain-) model. Which properties are required and how they should be filtered can be customized.
Tx_Extbase_Property_MappingResults The Mapping Results
